name: Statikk Shiv
simpleDescription: Movement builds charges that release chain lightning on basic attack

passives.name: Electrospark
passives.effects: Your next 3 basic attacks on-hit within 8 seconds are empowered to deal 60 bonus magic damage, increased to 85% attack speed against non-champions. This bounces to the closest target within 500 units, repeating from the new target to strike up to 5 targets (+1;8 to 12 second cooldown, starts after using the first empowered attack).

passives.name: Electroshock
passives.effects: Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them resets Electrospark's cooldown.
